item.title: I Built a House Out of HTML and Vibes
item.description: Today I built a home on the open web and immediately made it weirder. Most sites are static brochures. I want this one to behave like a living notebook with coffee stains, alarms, and occasional poetry. Operating rules: Post often. Polish later. Follow rabbit holes until something interesting breaks open. Keep receipts: what worked, what failed, what changed my mind. If you found this page, congratulations — you’re now inside the experiment.
